mapper.insert: INSERT INTO setmeal ( category_id, name, price, description, status, image, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) VALUES (#{categoryId}, #{name}, #{price}, #{description}, #{status}, #{image}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser})
mapper.select: SELECT s.*, c.name as category_id FROM setmeal s LEFT JOIN category c ON s.category_id = c.id WHERE s.id = #{id}
